item.title: Motion Graphic Designer and Video Editor for Turkish YT Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

We're filming YT  talking head videos and I need a help with creative editing and motion graphic process in Adobe Pr Pro and After Effects.

Example: https://www.youtube.com/@Vox/videos

Best candidate features:
- Creative thinker
- Creative and skilled in motion graphic design
- Availability at least 20-40 hours per week
- Be in close contact with the team


If you interested and you think you can handle this position, please send me 2 examples you did before.

Files about 50-100 gb, so you're internet speed is crucial.

Thanks!



Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 03:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Turkish
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Turkish
Country: Turkey
click to apply
